body:
lil pump is our fucking saviour you heard me? His lyrics are the best and he's fucking rich.

But he didn't save Avicus from falling so REST IN PEPPERONI AVICUS MY OPPORTUNITIES TO GET REF AGAIN ARE GONE XD IWANT2DIE
